scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] X-DolbyVoice-Client-LogId: 3373.xml X-DolbyVoice-MediaServer-MultiCodec: 0
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 110 a=rtpmap:110 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:110 0-16

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <createconference name="conf_0" deletewhen="nomedia"> <audiomix> <asn ri=" 90s" /> <n-loudest n="4" /> </audiomix> </createconference> </msml>

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <join id1="conn:[$client_sip_id]" id2="conf:conf_0"> <stream dir="to-id1" media="audio"> <clamp dtmf="false" /> <gain amt="0" /> </stream> <stream dir="from-id1" media="audio" dlb:audio_processing_ver="2"> <clamp dtmf="true" /> </stream> </join> </msml>

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <modifystream id1="conn:[$client_sip_id]" id2="conf:conf_0"> <stream dir="from-id1" media="audio" dlb:audio_processing_ver="1"> </stream> </modifystream> </msml>

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <modifystream id1="conn:[$client_sip_id]" id2="conf:conf_0"> <stream dir="from-id1" media="audio" dlb:audio_processing="disable"> <clamp dtmf="true" /> </stream> </modifystream> </msml>

nop.display: Enable Audio Processing, Resets to Default Setting

scenario.send:
INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <modifystream id1="conn:[$client_sip_id]" id2="conf:conf_0"> <stream dir="from-id1" media="audio" dlb:audio_processing="enable"> <clamp dtmf="true" /> </stream> </modifystream> </msml>

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
